attributes.additional_details:
By this petition, we ask the Parliament to pay attention to the activities of some British organization that supports, encourages and promotes the Russian invasion of Ukraine.

The organizations or branches of any global organizations that provide any form of support for the military actions, genocide and invasions of Ukraine, and any other country in the World, should not be legal in the UK. 

Such organizations should never have a status of a charity organization in the UK.

Financial support, ideological support, propaganda, and encouragement must be seen as the support. 

All assets of such organizations or individuals must be confiscated by the government and used to cover the damages caused by the military actions supported by the organization.
attributes.background: We are deeply concerned that some organisations, including charities, support Putin`s propaganda.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The regulation of charities is a matter for the Charity Commission 

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/charity-commission

The Government is already able to sanction organisations and individuals related to Russia.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614417
